700685f-a.text:
(1)
Bryant Avenue, east side, north from but not including Boston Road, to and including E. Tremont Avenue. The square 2-story brick house bears No. 1932 and the 2 -story frame house adjoining the apartment house bears No. 1942. The 6-story apartment house at the S.E. corner of E. Tremont Ave. bears
No. 1004 on the latter.
July 31, 1928
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Part of the same, showing a closer view of No. 1942 Bryant
AVenue and 1004 E. Tremont Avenue.
July 31, 1928
P. L. Sperr
700685f-a.folder: Bryant Avenue & Boston Road, Bronx, NY
